daniela.name: Daniela Pavin
daniela.bio: Italian in Seoul, convinced that each of us can and must make a difference in the fight against the worst enemy of planet earth: ourselves.

peng.name: Peng Zhong
peng.bio: Based in Toronto, Peng is a regular contributor to Virgo. He is part of the team that maintains the Virgo website.

virgo.name: Virgo Team
virgo.bio: We're a decentralized collective of people around the world who care about the state of both humanity and the environment, and want to make the world a better place.
